sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import PageHeader from "../components/PageHeader"; const About: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Mission */}

Our mission

AstraFocus Nexus turns a simple checklist into a supportive coach: it helps you choose what matters, work in focused bursts, and stay kind to yourself. No accounts needed‚Äîyour data stays on your device.

{/* Core features */}

Core features

  • üß† Wellness check-ins: mood buttons + stress slider with gentle suggestions.
  • ‚è∞ Pomodoro sessions: focus & breaks with chime, tab flash, and optional notifications.
  • üß≠ Eisenhower Matrix: prioritize by Urgent/Important so you start with the right things.
  • üéØ Goals: link tasks to outcomes (e.g., ‚ÄúWorkout ‚Üí Stronger body‚Äù) and see progress.
  • üîî Reminders: due-time notifications when you enable permission (browser popup).

Why it helps

  • Breaks big tasks into doable steps when stress is high.
  • Protects energy with 25/5 focus cycles and gentle nudges.
  • Makes priorities obvious‚Äîless busywork, more progress.
{/* Privacy & storage */}

Privacy & storage

Your tasks, settings, wellness entries, and goals are stored in localStorage in your browser:

  • task-tracker.tasks.v4 ‚Äî tasks
  • pomodoro.settings ‚Äî timer settings
  • task-tracker.goals.v1 ‚Äî goals
  • wellness.entry.YYYY-MM-DD ‚Äî daily mood/stress

No cloud, no account. Clearing browser data or using a different device/browser will remove data.

{/* Notifications help */}

Notifications

  • Click the bell (üîï ‚Üí üîî) in the navigation or Pomodoro box to grant permission.
  • Notifications work on HTTPS or localhost.
  • If blocked: check your browser site settings ‚Üí Notifications ‚Üí ‚ÄúAllow‚Äù.
{/* Tips */}

Tips

  • Press Enter in the task input to add quickly.
  • Tag priorities as you go: UI / UN / NI / NN.
  • Use the Wellness page when you feel stuck‚Äîpick one tiny step.
{/* FAQ moved to its own page */} {/* Roadmap */}

Roadmap

  • üìç Location reminders: ‚ÄúBuy milk‚Äù near a grocery store.
  • üéØ Focus mode: show only Today‚Äôs Top 3.
  • üß∞ Modes: Student / Job Seeker / Health / Finance templates.
  • üïπÔ∏è Gamification: XP, streaks, badges, daily challenges.
  • üìß Email summary: send daily/weekly reports automatically.
{/* Credits */}

Credits & contact

Built by Eskinder Kassahun (2025). Feedback or feature ideas? Email me.

); }; export default About;
